Q: AEM Aviation的航班总量在2024年每个月的变化趋势如何？
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                count(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1028"
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,
        concat( round(( num - last_num )/ last_num * 100, 2 ), '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_2
WHERE
        last_num IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
        date_month;
actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_flight_counts AS (
    SELECT
        a.date_month,
        COUNT(*) AS num
    FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE
        b.supplier_id = "AEM_航空公司对应的supplier_id"
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY
        a.date_month
)
SELECT
    *,
    LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_month_num,
    num - LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS diff_num,
    CONCAT(ROUND(((num - LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) / LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) * 100, 2), '%') AS rate
FROM
    monthly_flight_counts
ORDER BY
    date_month;

                AND b.supplier_id = "1025"

        supplier_id,

actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_flight_counts AS (
    SELECT
        a.date_month,
        count(*) AS num
    FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE
        b.supplier_id = "1027"
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY
        a.date_month
)
SELECT
    *,
    LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_month_num,
    num - LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS diff_num,
    CONCAT(ROUND(((num - LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) / LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) * 100, 2), '%') AS rate
FROM
    monthly_flight_counts
ORDER BY
    date_month ASC;

actual_SQL:

        a.date_month,
        count(*) as num
FROM
        ai_database_dev.zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
WHERE
        b.supplier_id = "XYZ" -- Replace "XYZ" with the actual supplier_id for AC Aviation Charter AG(Switzerland)
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
        AND '2024-12'
GROUP BY
        a.date_month
ORDER BY
        a.date_month ASC;

                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1030"
        GROUP BY

        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,

actual_SQL:
SELECT
        date_month,
        count(*) AS num_flights
FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
WHERE
        b.supplier_name = "Aero Air Charter LLC"
        AND date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
        AND '2024-12'
GROUP BY
        date_month
ORDER BY
        date_month ASC;

Q: Fly Tyrol的航班总量在2024年每个月的变化趋势如何？
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                count(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1009"
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,
        concat( round(( num - last_num )/ last_num * 100, 2 ), '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_2
WHERE
        last_num IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
        date_month;
actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_flight_counts AS (
    SELECT
        a.date_month,
        COUNT(*) AS num
    FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE
        b.supplier_id = "Fly Tyrol Supplier ID"  -- Replace with the actual supplier_id for Fly Tyrol
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY
        a.date_month
),
monthly_trend AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num
    FROM
        monthly_flight_counts
)
SELECT
    date_month,
    num,
    COALESCE(num - last_num, 0) AS diff_num,
    CASE
        WHEN last_num IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(ROUND((num - last_num) / last_num * 100, 2), '%')
        ELSE 'N/A'
    END AS rate
FROM
    monthly_trend
ORDER BY
    date_month ASC;

Q: Fly Tyrol的航班总量在2024年每个月的变化趋势如何？
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                count(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1009"
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,
        concat( round(( num - last_num )/ last_num * 100, 2 ), '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_2
WHERE
        last_num IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
        date_month;
actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_flight_counts AS (
    SELECT
        a.date_month,
        COUNT(*) AS num
    FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE
        b.supplier_name = 'Fly Tyrol'
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY
        a.date_month
),
monthly_changes AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num
    FROM
        monthly_flight_counts
)
SELECT
    date_month,
    num,
    COALESCE(num - last_num, 0) AS change_in_flights,
    CASE
        WHEN last_num IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(ROUND(((num - last_num) / last_num) * 100, 2), '%')
        ELSE 'N/A'
    END AS rate_of_change
FROM
    monthly_changes
ORDER BY
    date_month;

                count(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1001"
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,

        last_num IS NOT NULL

actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_flights AS (
    SELECT
        a.date_month,
        count(*) AS num
    FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE
        b.supplier_id = "1121"  -- Assuming "1121" is the supplier_id for 24/7 Jet Inc.
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
        AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY
        a.date_month
),
monthly_trend AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        lag(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num
    FROM
        monthly_flights
)
SELECT
    date_month,
    num,
    last_num,
    num - last_num AS diff_num,
    concat(ROUND(((num - last_num) / last_num) * 100, 2), '%') AS rate
FROM
    monthly_trend
ORDER BY
    date_month ASC;

Q: ACI Jet的航班总量在2024年每个月的变化趋势如何？
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                count(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1019"
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,
        concat( round(( num - last_num )/ last_num * 100, 2 ), '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_2
WHERE
        last_num IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
        date_month;
actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_flight_counts AS (
    SELECT
        a.date_month,
        count(*) AS num
    FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE
        b.supplier_id = "1030"
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY
        a.date_month
)
SELECT
    *,
    lag(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num,
    (num - lag(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) AS diff_num,
    CONCAT(ROUND(((num - lag(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) / NULLIF(lag(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month), 0)) * 100, 2), '%') AS rate
FROM
    monthly_flight_counts;

                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,

WITH monthly_flight_count AS (

        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
        AND '2024-12'

),
monthly_change AS (

SELECT
    date_month,
    num,

ORDER BY
    date_month ASC;

Q: 45 North Aviation的航班总量在2024年每个月的变化趋势如何？
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                count(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1004"
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,
        concat( round(( num - last_num )/ last_num * 100, 2 ), '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_2
WHERE
        last_num IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
        date_month;
actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_trend AS (
    SELECT
        a.date_month,
        COUNT(*) AS num
    FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE
        b.supplier_id = "45"  -- Assuming '45' is the supplier_id for 45 North Aviation
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY
        a.date_month
),
monthly_changes AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num
    FROM
        monthly_trend
)
SELECT
    date_month,
    num,
    COALESCE(num - last_num, 0) AS diff_num,
    COALESCE(CONCAT(ROUND(((num - last_num) / NULLIF(last_num, 0)) * 100, 2), '%'), 'N/A') AS rate
FROM
    monthly_changes
ORDER BY
    date_month ASC;

Q: 24/7 Jet Inc.的航班总量在2024年每个月的变化趋势如何？
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                count(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1001"
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,
        concat( round(( num - last_num )/ last_num * 100, 2 ), '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_2
WHERE
        last_num IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
        date_month;
actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_flight_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        a.date_month,
        COUNT(*) AS num
    FROM 
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE 
        b.supplier_id = "24/7 Jet Inc."
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY 
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY 
        a.date_month
)
SELECT 
    date_month, 
    num, 
    LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS prev_month_num,
    num - LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS diff_num,
    CONCAT(ROUND((num - LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) / LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) * 100, 2), '%') AS rate_change
FROM 
    monthly_flight_counts;

Q: AC Aviation Charter(Austria)的航班总量在2024年每个月的变化趋势如何？
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                count(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
                AND b.supplier_id = "1014"
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, lag( num ) over ( PARTITION BY supplier_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ) SELECT
        supplier_id,
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,
        concat( round(( num - last_num )/ last_num * 100, 2 ), '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_2
WHERE
        last_num IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
        date_month;
actual_SQL:
WITH monthly_flight_counts AS (
    SELECT
        a.date_month,
        COUNT(*) AS num
    FROM
        zts_plane_flight_1 a
        JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
    WHERE
        b.supplier_name = "AC Aviation Charter(Austria)"
        AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
    GROUP BY
        a.date_month
    ORDER BY
        a.date_month
)
SELECT
    date_month,
    num,
    LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num,
    num - LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS diff_num,
    CONCAT(ROUND(((num - LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) / LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month)) * 100, 2), '%') AS rate
FROM
    monthly_flight_counts;
